title: Measurement standards branch; administrator
context: ยง486-4 Measurement standards branch; administrator. There shall be a measurement standards branch within the department. The administrator shall enforce the board&rsquo;s rules and administer the branch and such technical and clerical personnel as are necessary to carry out this chapter, in accord with the power, authority and duties delegated by the board.
